title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Plan A Field Trip
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip               Plan A Field Trip      Plan A Field Trip The Jimmy Carter National Historic Site includes the Plains High School Museum, the Plains Depot, and the Jimmy Carter Boyhood Farm providing the perfect indoor and outdoor classroom for field trip studies. Teachers have several options for bringing students to visit the park. We can assist you in arranging guided day programs or a self-guided tour. For additional information contact: Patty Kuehn  Phone: 229-942-0045  E-mail: Patty Kuehn Education Program Request Form
